value.title: How to design stunning Power BI reports: From initial sketches to final result
value.excerpt: You have asked me how I design my Power BI reports and this video I will show you how I created my last Power BI report and how I went about doing that.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: Import your excel model into Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you spent hours creating an excel model with Power Query and PowerPivot and you or your company has now decided to move to Power BI?  Well, don't worry, you can import your excel models in Power BI and most of it will be imported, included the visuals if you created them using Power View, Yey!

I am going to show you an easy way to solve this.  Here you can download the pbix file: http://trantor.synology.me:5000/fbsharing/nc9kfXTw

value.title: Scrape data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI.  LINK to NFL site: http://www.nfl.com/stats/categorystats?tabSeq=2&offensiveStatisticCategory=TEAM_PASSING&conference=ALL&role=TM&season=2015&seasonType=REG

value.title: Trim column headers with spaces in between words in one step in Power Query
value.excerpt: There is a trim function in Power Query to get rid of spaces at the beginning or end of a phrase, but unlike excel trim, it wont get rid of excess whitespaces between words. value.title: Update Power BI Desktop automatically
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to install power bi desktop so you get automatic downloads every time the power Bi team releases a new version.  The great thing about this is that you dont need to have administrator rights on your computer to get the download. Great if you are a big company right?
